english.segment1: I love You. I love You Lord. There's nothing above You Lord. I am not my own - I am not alone. I am waiting on You Lord. And this is my desire: to go deeper into You
english.segment2: Father - Father me. Jesus You're all I see. I am not my own. And I am not alone. I am waiting on You Lord. And this is my desire: to go deeper into You
english.segment3: I am always in Your heart. I am always in Your heart
